name: Donut Maker!
description:
Have you ever wanted to craft the perfect donut? Have you ever been at Duck Donuts or similar custom donut establishments and almost cracked under the pressure of trying to decide what to get? Well, WORRY NO MORE! Now you can design a beautiful and tasty donut from the comfort of your own home!

Donut Maker! is a simple donut customizer. It features 6 donut flavors, 5 icing flavors, 5 drizzle flavors, and 5 kinds of toppings. Mix-and-match flavors and toppings to create your dream donut! Stare at its majesty! Wish you had the real thing!

Inktober 2016 drawing the game artwork is based on

Donut Maker! is my very first game! It was made in GameMaker Studio 2 for The Minimalist Jam. While I consider the game itself is finished as-is, I would love to continue to develop and improve upon it in the future. As a newbie developer there are definitely aspects that could be optimized, and I would love to do that as I learn more!

Suggested donation is the price of a Krispy Kreme Original Glazed, or $1.19.
